ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Portin'
ygData.msgSnippet: Shamans can make a personal teleport potion to Field of Bone.  Finding a shaman who could make one and sell it to you at a decent price might be a chore
ygData.messageBody:
Shamans can make a personal teleport potion to Field of Bone. Finding a
shaman who could make one and sell it to you at a decent price might be a
chore though...


Mackmillan



On Thu, 17 May 2001 LeSamLam@... wrote:

> As far as I know, there's only the port to the Dreadlands. I've never been
> there. My husband went the other night and was scared to death. He just
> took off running and made it safely but how I don't know. Just dumb luck.
> He's a 30 mage now, was 28 then and everything he passed was conning red to
> him. He said he will stick to the boats for a while.
>
> Lena
>
>
> > Speaking of porting...how can I get a port to Kunark?
> >
> > Not Dreadlands...but closer to Cabilis
> > and without taking the barrel barge?
> >
> > is there anywhere else that will get me into Kunark besides one of the boats
> > or the DL port...please
> >
>
>
>
>
>
